name: BlockStacker
description:
Take the blocks and stack them! This is the concept of this physics game, but in the end it's not that simple.
Choose the right position for each block so that they don't fall down. If you've stacked all blocks in a save position the next level

gets unlocked. Every level has different blocks and needs another tactic to be solved.
The higher the level the trickier it gets.

Have fun with BlockStacker!
